long_description: Keep your snacks from getting crushed with the portable Stanley Utility Snack Holder. Toss in 16 oz. of chips, pretzels or crackers to get you through the day. Scoopable interior makes it easy to fill up. Snap-on lid fastens to top or bottom. Fits in most car cup holders. Stanley Utility Snack Holder is dishwasher safe. Closeout.
short_description: Keep your snacks from getting crushed with the portable Stanley Utility Snack Holder. Toss in 16 oz. of chips, pretzels or crackers to get you through the day.
